interfaceDescription: Object passed as parameter in the row getRowClassName callback prop.

indexRelativeToCurrentPage.description:
Index of the row in the current page.
If the pagination is disabled, it will be the index relative to all filtered rows.

isFirstVisible.description: Whether this row is the first visible or not.

isLastVisible.description: Whether this row is the last visible or not.

row.description: The row model of the row that the current cell belongs to.
